channel.title: A9s1 - album [Electronic, Album]
channel.description:
A9s1 - album anechoik (a 3 part project, this is part 1.)
album description: “an expedition into infinite space.”
each track is heavily produced meaning it’s very rich in detail. please listen in order, the tracks each has a story to tell.
!! BEFORE YOU LISTEN, PLEASE READ THE TRACK DESCRIPTIONS, IT WILL HELP YOU UNDERSTAND WHAT THE INCENTIVES OF EACH TRACKS HAS TO OFFER, THANK YOU SO MUCH !!
TRACKLIST:
1. rainbow - “atheist? never heard of. going beyond the clouds.” 2. animus - “wild war grounds. invasion?” 3. sulfur - “fascinated in a new world diffusion.” 4. monarch - “a glimpse of futuristic motors/technology.” 5. v - “mixed dimension.” 6. -98.x1 - “accelerates, slow motion.” 7. lazarus - “strange phenomenon?” 8. neb.ula - “flees away, now loneliness in the cosmic universe.” 9. hyperorchid - “orchid blooms after a worldly chaos, just a thought.” 10. CHROMA - “finding ZEN and landing back home.”
**STORE-LINKS**
[Apple Music](https://music.apple.com/us/artist/anechoik/1216629620) [iTunes](https://music.apple.com/us/album/a9s1/1513916515) [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/album/3dGgHxv52vcY9U0uhRbSun?si=toHEL44VTi2EZQwhDYGQ-Q) Soundcloud: (coming soon)
**SOCIAL MEDIA**
[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/anechoik/?hl=en) [Twitter](https://twitter.com/anechoik) [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGfVr9RggJEgTWmcdc6cO3Q) [Discord](https://discord.gg/q5VfgN)
P.S: i wanted to say thank you to those supportive people for believing in me and my music ever since the beginning. i cant thank you guys enough for streaming my content. here’s to many more and the future. ALSO, PLEASE SHARE THIS WITH YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY, BLAST THEM ON YOUR SPEAKERS OR IN YOUR CAR, OR LISTEN TO IT WITH HEADPHONES!! ANY MUSICAL EXPOSURE IS ACCEPTABLE!! ♡

item.title: A9s1 - album [Electronic, Album]
item.dc:creator: VJM
item.description:
A treat to the ears as well as the mind. I could listen to this on repeat for days. I look forward to the rest of the series! Keep up the good work

item.title: A9s1 - album [Electronic, Album]
item.dc:creator: anechoik
item.description:
A9s1 - album
anechoik
(a 3 part project, this is part 1.)

album description: “an expedition into infinite space.”

each track is heavily produced meaning it’s very rich in detail. please listen in order, the tracks each has a story to tell.

!! BEFORE YOU LISTEN, PLEASE READ THE TRACK DESCRIPTIONS, IT WILL HELP YOU UNDERSTAND WHAT THE INCENTIVES OF EACH TRACKS HAS TO OFFER, THANK YOU SO MUCH !!

TRACKLIST:

  1. rainbow - “atheist? never heard of. going beyond the clouds.”
  2. animus - “wild war grounds. invasion?”
  3. sulfur - “fascinated in a new world diffusion.”
  4. monarch - “a glimpse of futuristic motors/technology.”
  5. v - “mixed dimension.”
  6. -98.x1 - “accelerates, slow motion.”
  7. lazarus - “strange phenomenon?”
  8. neb.ula - “flees away, now loneliness in the cosmic universe.”
  9. hyperorchid - “orchid blooms after a worldly chaos, just a thought.”
  10. CHROMA - “finding ZEN and landing back home.”

STORE-LINKS

Apple Music
iTunes
Spotify
Soundcloud: (coming soon)

SOCIAL MEDIA

Instagram
Twitter
Youtube
Discord

P.S: i wanted to say thank you to those supportive people for believing in me and my music ever since the beginning. i cant thank you guys enough for streaming my content. here’s to many more and the future. ALSO, PLEASE SHARE THIS WITH YOUR FRIENDS AND FAMILY, BLAST THEM ON YOUR SPEAKERS OR IN YOUR CAR, OR LISTEN TO IT WITH HEADPHONES!! ANY MUSICAL EXPOSURE IS ACCEPTABLE!!
